attributes.action: Raise airport security maximum size of carry-on toiletries to 125ml
attributes.additional_details:
As an air traveller
I would like to be able take 125ml tubes of toothpaste through airport security when travelling with only carry-on
So that I can bring the toothpaste tube I have at home
So that regulation matches the sizes commonly available in stores
So that I don't feel wasteful when security unnecessarily throws them away
So that there isn't unnecessary extra trash created

Please raise the maximum size of an allowable container to 125ml from 100ml, to reduce toiletries thrown away at airport security. (Because the majority of sizes of things in stores are 125ml)
